item.description:
Here's another great deal. UpStairs on the Square, (located steps from the Harvard Square MBTA station) is offering the Restaurant Week menu for the entire month of March.

The $20.07 per person cost includes three courses (anything from the bar is extra)...another delicious bargain brunch.

http://www.upstairson...

Boston Globe review
"UpStairs on the Square displays exuberance in every aspect from the wildly decorative design to the ambience to the food and the chefs creating it ... A blockbuster musical in the guise of a restaurant"

Join us for great conversation and food in a truly unique setting.

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: UpStairs on the Square Brunch
